segments.text: I feel absolutely horrible . My temperature is 41 degrees Celsius , and I've got a headache and a runny nose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: do you have any other symptoms ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've also got a terrible stomach-ache . Is my face still swollen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: just a little . Has your toothache gone now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , for the most part . It doesn't feel as bad as my other ailments , anyway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: how about your tongue ? Does it still hurt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no , the burn ointment seemed to take effect right away . I think it's already healed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: how did you get that burn again ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I scalded on the hot coffee a few days ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you haven't had much luck lately , have you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no , but I'm sure I'll get better soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: when's the last time you took your tablets ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I took the red ones just before lunch and the white ones just after lunch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it's time you took another does of each . What would you like to drink with them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: just some water , please . Do you have any ointment for my nose ? It feels so itchy after blowing my nose so much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure , I'll just go and get it now . what would you like to eat ? Some soup ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: soup always makes me feel better when I'm sick . I hope it makes you feel better , too .
segments.speaker: S2
